name.str: XL heavy survivor helmet

description: A customized, heavily armored steel and Kevlar helmet, modified to provide maximum comfort and protection from harm.  All the added material has made it rather heavy.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation

name.str: XL BL9-infused survivor helmet

description: A survivor helmet, modernized and infused with BL9, it is partially covered with almost sentient BL9 strengthening and hardening the helmet acting as a kevlar or ceramic alternative  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation

name.str: XL BL9-infused survivor cargo pants

description: A pair of survivor cargo pants, modernized and infused with BL9, it is partially covered with almost sentient BL9 strengthening and hardening the pants acting as a kevlar or ceramic alternative  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation

name.str: XL BL9-infused survivor suit

description: A survivor armored suit, modernized and infused with BL9, it is partially covered with almost sentient BL9 strengthening and hardening the suit acting as a kevlar or ceramic alternative  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation

name.str: pair of XL BL9-infused survivor gloves

description: A pair of survivor gloves, modernized and infused with BL9, it is partially covered with almost sentient BL9 strengthening and hardening the gloves acting as a kevlar or ceramic alternative  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation

name.str: pair of XL BL9-infused survivor boots

description: A pair of survivor boots, modernized and infused with BL9, it is partially covered with almost sentient BL9 strengthening and hardening the boots acting as a kevlar or ceramic alternative  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation

name.str: XL BL9-infused survivor body armor

description: A survivor body armor, modernized and infused with BL9, it is partially covered with almost sentient BL9 strengthening and hardening the armor acting as a kevlar or ceramic alternative  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation

name.str: XL BL9 experimental survivor helmet

description: A highly experimental sleek and futuristic survivor helmet with a unique design that is infused with physically and chemically structure-wise modified BL9 to be versatile, enhance the user's capabilities (<color_light_blue>+2 int, +2 per</color>) and offer better environmental protection  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation

name.str: XL BL9 experimental survivor cargo pants

description: Highly experimental sleek and futuristic pair of survivor cargo pants with a unique design that is infused with physically and chemically structure-wise modified BL9 to be versatile, enhance the user's capabilities (<color_light_blue>+1 str, +2 dex</color>) and offer better environmental protection  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation

name.str: XL BL9 experimental survivor suit

description: A highly experimental sleek and futuristic survivor suit with a unique design that is infused with physically and chemically structure-wise modified BL9 to be versatile, enhance the user's capabilities (<color_light_blue>+1 str, +1 dex, +1 int, +1 per, +10% to attack speed, +10% to action points</color>) and offer better environmental protection  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation

name.str: pair of XL experimental BL9 survivor gloves

description: A highly experimental sleek and futuristic pair of survivor gloves with a unique design that is infused with physically and chemically structure-wise modified BL9 to be versatile, enhance the user's capabilities (<color_light_blue>+1 dex, +25% to attack speed</color>) and offer better environmental protection  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation

name.str: XL BL9-infused survivor helmet MK ii

description: A survivor helmet, modernized and fully infused with BL9, it is entirely covered and reinforced with a very strong, evolved, perfectly sentient and durable version of BL9, multiple spiky vibrating protrusions emerge from the outer layer of it's thick tissue  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
